sentences.en: All important work is personally approved by him.
sentences.cn: 所有重要的工作都由他亲自批准。

sentences.en: at first I took it personally when he yelled at me.
sentences.cn: 起初我还以为他对我吼叫是冲着我来的。

sentences.en: He didn't just command. He personally fought in several heavy battles.
sentences.cn: 他不仅仅发号施令，还身先士卒参加了几次激战。

sentences.en: He personally had received orders from Commander Lehmann to scuttle the ship.
sentences.cn: 他个人已收到莱曼司令要求凿沉轮船的命令。

sentences.en: I can personally attest that the cold and flu season is here.
sentences.cn: 感冒和流感季节来了，对此我有切身体会。

sentences.en: I have orders to deliver it to Mr Demiris personally.
sentences.cn: 我奉命要把它送给德米里斯先生本人。

sentences.en: I have personally been devoted to this cause for many years.
sentences.cn: 多年来我个人一直一心扑在这项事业上。

sentences.en: I personally don't want to release my anger on anyone else.
sentences.cn: 我个人并不想把自己的愤怒发泄在别人身上。

sentences.en: I personally think it’s too cold to go out.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为太冷了不能出去。

sentences.en: I think it's going to cause chaos personally but never mind.
sentences.cn: 我个人认为它会引起混乱，但是没关系。

sentences.en: I'd just like to mention that, personally, I don't think it's wise.
sentences.cn: 我只是想说，就我个人而言，我认为这并不明智。

sentences.en: I’ll see to it personally.
sentences.cn: 这件事我要亲自处理。

sentences.en: Parks has a tendency to become personally involved with his photographic subjects.
sentences.cn: 帕克斯往往会跟他的拍摄对象产生感情纠葛。

sentences.en: Personally, I could care less whether the Giants come or not.
sentences.cn: 就我个人来说，我根本就不在乎巨人队来还是不来。

sentences.en: Personally, I don’t think much of the idea.
sentences.cn: 就个人而言，我认为这个主意不怎么样。

sentences.en: Remember, stick to the issues and don't take it personally.
sentences.cn: 记住，就事论事，不要把问题个人化。

sentences.en: The managing director wrote personally to thank me.
sentences.cn: 总经理亲自写信向我表示感谢。

sentences.en: The minister is returning to Paris to answer the allegations personally.
sentences.cn: 部长将返回巴黎亲自回应那些指控。

sentences.en: The opening months of 1987 were difficult, personally and professionally.
sentences.cn: 无论从个人生活还是从工作上来说，1987年初的几个月都非常艰难。

sentences.en: This has taken a great toll on me personally and professionally.
sentences.cn: 这给我的个人生活和我的工作都造成了严重的不良影响。

sentences.en: When the great man arrived, the club's manager personally escorted him upstairs.
sentences.cn: 那位要人到达时，俱乐部经理亲自陪他上楼。

words.tran_cn: 人事消息栏；人称代名词
个性化（personalize的过去式）；个人化

phrases.tran_cn: 就个人来说，就自己而言

trans.tran_cn: 在个人看来，亲自，当面地，个别地，私人地，无礼地
trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that you are only giving your own opinion about something
